title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.12 - Required safety valves
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.12 - Required safety valves

State Regulations

The safety valve capacity of each boiler shall be such
that the safety valve or valves will discharge all the steam that can be
generated by the boiler without allowing the pressure to rise more than six
percent above the maximum allowable working pressure, or more than six percent
above the highest pressure to which any valve is set. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-10.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
